attributes.action: pay less JSA each week to those receiving it in order to encourage them into work, and stop them remaining on JSA for long periods.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Petition set up to encourage the reduction of long term JSA claimants by making it increasingly difficult to live on JSA. 
This could be done by starting Job seekers off on a resonable income, as it is at present, and then by gradually decreasing the weekly entitlement so that those on jsa feel time pressure to get into work as they are receiving less money each week.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
